full_summary:
================================

### Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Title**

Hotel Reception Services for Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) College Occupants

**Reference Number**

cb-4326-81016709

**Publication Date**

March 20, 2023

**Tender Closing Date**

May 5, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Amendment Date**

May 5, 2023

**Contract Details**

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) College, located in Rigaud, Quebec, invites proposals for hotel reception services to be provided to its occupants. 

The required services include:

* Bilingual reception, reservation, and front desk services
* Services must be available 24/7, 365 days a year

**Contract Period**

The contract term is from June 1, 2023, to May 31, 2025, with the option to extend for up to four additional one-year periods.

**Services Location**

All work shall be carried out at the CBSA campus in Rigaud, located at:

Collège de Rigaud
475 Chemin Grande Ligne
Rigaud, Quebec J0P 1P0

**Proposal Guidelines**

Interestees can obtain the tender documents from the Bid torso webpage ([Canada Buys](https://buyandsell.gc.ca)) by searching with the reference number cb-4326-81016709.

### Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.

### Contact Information

For further information or clarification, please contact:

Marie-France Chrétien
Assistant Director, Procurement and Materiel Management
Canada Border Services Agency
Phone: (514) 210-5405
Email: <CBSA-ASFC_Solicitations-Demandes_de_soumissions@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca>

Please direct your questions in writing via email. No phone or personal inquiries will be entertained.

### Reference Documents

The tender documents are available on the Bidrado webpage in both English and French, with the following links:

-  [Tender Notice - RFP-Amd-001](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4326/pr91157---1000426189---rfp-amd-001.pdf)
